mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coupon_info(couponId, couponName, couponPrice, couponStDate, couponEndDate, minPrice, gradeList) VALUES(#{ couponId } , #{ couponName }, #{ couponPrice }, #{ couponStDate } , #{ couponEndDate }, #{ minPrice }, #{ gradeList });

INSERT INTO coupon_list (couponId, clientId, couponStatus) SELECT ci.couponId, c.clientId, '사용가능' FROM coupon_info AS ci JOIN client AS c ON FIND_IN_SET(c.gradeId, ci.gradeList) > 0 WHERE ci.couponStDate BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND now() AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM coupon_list cl WHERE cl.couponId = ci.couponId AND cl.clientId = c.clientId );
mapper.update: UPDATE coupon_list cl SET cl.couponStatus='기간만료' WHERE cl.couponStatus="사용가능" AND EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM coupon_info ci WHERE ci.couponId = cl.couponId AND ci.couponEndDate < NOW());
UPDATE FROM coupon_list WHERE couponStatus=#{ couponStatus }
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM coupon_info WHERE couponId=#{ couponId }
